item.description:
This is a hike that our single members might enjoy. Charlie's Active Singles hikes are for active single people in their 30's through 50's and average up to 200 people per event! These events have been found to be fun and well planned!

Meet-up is at 9:00 AM at location of the hike. Hikers are usually split up into 3 different hiking skill levels (something like advanced, novice, and social) and the difficulty of the hike corresponds. The hike starts at 9:30 AM and usually lasts about 2 hours. Afterwards, dinner facilities are arranged for refueling and socializing. ;-)

DIRECTIONS (a bit sketchy but best I have -Contact Charlie for clearer directions):
* Take I-84 West & get off Exit 10
* End of ramp take right onto Church Hill Rd.
** Follow Church Hill Rd up hill to Intersection of Rte 25 (Flagpole).
* Turn left onto Rte 25 (South)
* Continue on Rte 25 till it turns into Highway.
* Get off Exit 9
* Parking lot is across street at end of Ramp.

* I-84 East, take Exit 10
* At end of ramp take left onto Church Hill Rd.
* Follow direction above (**).

++ Route 25 North, take exit 9
* End of ramp turn left onto Daniels Farm Rd.
* Cross over Highway and take first right onto Park St.
* Parking lot on left.

* Merrit Parkway take Exit 49N onto Rte 25.
* Follow Rte 25 North directions above (++).

**Approximate location/directions via Mapquest:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Active Singles is a 10 year old, non-profit Connecticut organization that brings together singles who enjoy participating in a variety of outdoor activities.

CONTACT: Charlie (organizer of Active Singles) 860-489-9611

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at this hike. Just mingle with the other Active Singles (you're one!).

NO Children or Dogs, Singles only (this doesn't mean you can't have a boyfriend or girlfriend). Wear Hiking Boots. Bring water. Optional Brunch follows each hike. Non hikers can join us at the restaurant. Call Charlie early to reserve a spot for Brunch.

Active Singles
http://www.activesing...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Active Singles Hike to Daniels Farm Rd in Monroe CT
